description.value:
The reality you conjure is much brighter than your own. The area of your quantum field becomes bright light. Creatures who begin their in your quantum field must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:witchwarper|options:area-effect,inflicts:dazzled,inflicts:blinded] save against your class DC; creatures with light blindness treat their result as one step worse.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Dazzled] for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Blinded] for 1 round, then dazzled for 1 round.
